data.taskTitle: Fix activity log showing no activity despite toast alerts
Fix activity log showing no activity despite toast alerts
data.approach: Two issues: 1) Activity log uses local state + subscription that misses events fired before page load, 2) User wants to edit stall detection rule which is possible via RuleEditor

data.taskTitle: activity log on /automation shows no activity yet but we are getting toast alerts

summary: Fixed CSS bug where action buttons (Edit, Clone, Delete) were permanently invisible due to inline style override
Removed conflicting opacity:0 inline style from RulesList.svelte action buttons container
Documented Common Pitfall #6: Inline Styles Override Tailwind Classes in CLAUDE.md
Added Editing Existing Rules section to shared/automation.md with UI and code examples

quality.preExisting: TypeScript errors are pre-existing and unrelated to this fix

suggestedTasks.title: Review other components for inline style vs Tailwind conflicts
suggestedTasks.description: Search for elements with both style="opacity" and class="...opacity..." patterns which indicate the same CSS bug pattern
suggestedTasks.reason: Same bug pattern could exist elsewhere in the codebase

patterns: Never use inline style="opacity: 0;" with Tailwind opacity classes - inline always wins
For hover visibility, use EITHER Tailwind group-hover pattern OR inline styles, not both
gotchas: CSS specificity: inline styles always override class-based styles regardless of specificity
